name: places/ChIJL8v1nBNawokRpjUiHY37hSA
formattedAddress: 1 State Street Plaza, New York, NY 10004, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1 State Street Plaza, New York, NY 10004, USA

originalText.text:
I am writing to express my severe dissatisfaction with the services your background check company provided. I applied for a job and was informed that a background check was required. I promptly submitted all the necessary documents and information to your company.

However, I was shocked to discover that your company continually pushes back its process regarding the completion date of my background check. Despite completing their other checks weeks ago one county remains uncompleted. This county isn’t even aware that there is a request for information on me.  Your representatives have continually told me that the check was still in progress when the county clerk is unaware that a review has begun. This caused a delay in the start date of my new job which is very frustrating.

Furthermore, I feel that your company has been intentionally preventing me and others from starting our position due to your lack of commitment to read and develop improved processes based on the thousands of poor reviews you’ve received.  This has caused me a great deal of stress and anxiety, and I am highly dissatisfied with your services.

I demand that you take immediate action to rectify this situation. I expect prompt and honest communication from your company.

I hope that you will take these concerns seriously and take the necessary steps to ensure that this type of situation does not occur in the future.

originalText.text: Waited almost 3 weeks for the job and they put me as a level three and disqualify me from the job, but have nothing to do with the job so it makes no sense at all this background check  sterling need to be shut down sterling background is trash

originalText.text: Takes too long for background checks. They are just another profit based company that doesn't care about the true customers. Only worried about collecting money from companies. A classic example of failed business strategies.

text.text: Takes too long for background checks. They are just another profit based company that doesn't care about the true customers. Only worried about collecting money from companies. A classic example of failed business strategies.

originalText.text: My personal experience was completely different from the other reviewers.  My background and drug screening had a 3 day turnaround.  Additionally, on the first day that it was initiated, I had trouble with the system and Uzma Qureshi, a Sterling representative, provided the utmost professional and helpful customer service.

text.text: My personal experience was completely different from the other reviewers.  My background and drug screening had a 3 day turnaround.  Additionally, on the first day that it was initiated, I had trouble with the system and Uzma Qureshi, a Sterling representative, provided the utmost professional and helpful customer service.

originalText.text: I completed their form for a background check for a new position and they refused to contact my previous employers, saying they had no response. When I contacted my former employers, no one had contacted them. Next, this company demanded my tax returns and I knew then that was not a normal part of any background check. I have been through many of these and NEVER had been asked for my tax returns-total scam. The calls I received were from persons who could not even speak English. Additionally, there was no information on their security and encryption protections for personal information and my request for a copy of my report was marked “no”. Completely unprofessional!
